name: Jurassic Excite
description:
Dinosaurs who lived in peace began to rampage with the power of magic!
With a magic hammer Help the dinosaurs!
 
Just swing the hammer in the direction of the dinosaurs!
You can also shake a hammer with Joy-Con!
 
Because you can play together with them,
Challenge your friends and family to difficult stages!
 
Something happens if you get a high score on a difficult stage.
